Description:
This rule detects that the path to the DLL written in the registry is different from the default one. Launched WAB.exe tries to load the DLL from Registry.

Author: oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Execution DLL of Choice Using WAB.EXE
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\software\microsoft\wab\dllpath' and  not details = '%commonprogramfiles%\system\wab32.dll')
